mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UMS_DEST ( MSGID ,DESTNUM ,DESTNM ,VAR1 ,VAR2 ,VAR3 ,VAR4 ) SELECT #{msgId} ,DESTNUM ,DESTNM ,VAR1 ,VAR2 ,VAR3 ,VAR4 FROM UMS_DEST_TEMP
mapper.select: SELECT S.MSGID ,S.SCHDTYPE ,S.SUBJECT ,S.DEPARTNUM ,S.NOWDATE ,S.SENDDATE ,S.MSGCNT ,S.MSGCONTENT ,S.ATTACHFILE ,S.RESERVED1 ,S.RESERVED2 ,D.DESTNUM ,D.DESTNM ,D.VAR1 ,D.VAR2 ,D.VAR3 ,D.VAR4 FROM UMS_MSG_SEND S, UMS_DEST D WHERE S.MSGID = D.MSGID AND S.MSGID=#{MSGID}
